line.comment: * [THIS] will go to $target sector before entering the main loop, even if $follow is set to [FALSE].
* Useful for some scripts, like !ship.signal.attacked and !fight.defend.monitor, to avoid spamming this script or move to another sector.
* Check if we have enough missiles.
* Sets the target and go to it if not in sector.
* If we are an AI M7M, we want to make sure that there are no better targets around.
* Player carriers. If they have idle ships onboard, we make them support ships. Same code in !ship.signal.attacked.
* do if $target-> is of class [Huge Ship]
* === This script should never be reset. ===
* skip if [THIS]-> is script '!fight.attack.object.stationTactics' on stack of task=1332
* [THIS]-> begin task 1332 with script '!fight.attack.object.stationTactics' and priority 1000: arg1=$target arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
* $flRet = [THIS]-> follow object $target with precision $maxLaserRange m : timeout=$timeout ms
* if not [THIS]-> is $target in firing range of turret 0
* We don't need a defensive move here, it's just useless, we want the above to happen at all costs.
* If Fox 2, fire incoming missile if any. This is to simulate the heatseeker flag a little bit better than the engine does.
* Interrupt the fight if the target is no longer an enemy. Check also the exit procedure of this script, and !fight.defend.monitor.
* Only one fallback per fight (for low shields).
* Don't fallback if our chaser is faster than us.
* Bailing new system: we have fled, maybe we don't want to get back in the fight.
* Attacking manoeuvre: go higher than $target if we have enough room.
* Don't do fancy manoeuvres if the player is attacking the same target; save him instead.
* Ignore if we are attached to a carrier.
* do if [THIS]-> is script 'Mayhem.Task.Support' on stack of task=0
*skip if [THIS]-> is script '!fight.attack.object.stationTactics' on stack of task=1332
*[THIS]-> begin task 1332 with script '!fight.attack.object.stationTactics' and priority 1000: arg1=$target arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null

sval.val: [THIS] will go to $target sector before entering the main loop, even if $follow is set to [FALSE].
Useful for some scripts, like !ship.signal.attacked and !fight.defend.monitor, to avoid spamming this script or move to another sector.
Check if we have enough missiles.
Sets the target and go to it if not in sector.
If we are an AI M7M, we want to make sure that there are no better targets around.
Player carriers. If they have idle ships onboard, we make them support ships. Same code in !ship.signal.attacked.
do if $target-> is of class [Huge Ship]
=== This script should never be reset. ===
skip if [THIS]-> is script '!fight.attack.object.stationTactics' on stack of task=1332
[THIS]-> begin task 1332 with script '!fight.attack.object.stationTactics' and priority 1000: arg1=$target arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
$flRet = [THIS]-> follow object $target with precision $maxLaserRange m : timeout=$timeout ms
if not [THIS]-> is $target in firing range of turret 0
We don't need a defensive move here, it's just useless, we want the above to happen at all costs.
If Fox 2, fire incoming missile if any. This is to simulate the heatseeker flag a little bit better than the engine does.
Interrupt the fight if the target is no longer an enemy. Check also the exit procedure of this script, and !fight.defend.monitor.
Only one fallback per fight (for low shields).
Don't fallback if our chaser is faster than us.
Bailing new system: we have fled, maybe we don't want to get back in the fight.
Attacking manoeuvre: go higher than $target if we have enough room.
Don't do fancy manoeuvres if the player is attacking the same target; save him instead.
Ignore if we are attached to a carrier.
do if [THIS]-> is script 'Mayhem.Task.Support' on stack of task=0
skip if [THIS]-> is script '!fight.attack.object.stationTactics' on stack of task=1332
[THIS]-> begin task 1332 with script '!fight.attack.object.stationTactics' and priority 1000: arg1=$target arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
